comments:
Return the tree nodes in the trees which match the given pattern.

param pattern: a tgrep search pattern :type pattern: str or output of tgrep_compile() :param trees: a sequence of NLTK trees (usually ParentedTrees) :type trees: iter(ParentedTree) or iter(Tree) :param search_leaves: whether ot return matching leaf nodes :type search_leaves: bool :rtype: iter(tree nodes)
